sentences.en: After the clinical examination, the consultant invited his students to put forward any suggestions they had kicked about the nature of the disease.
sentences.cn: 临床检查完毕, 会诊医师就请学生提出个人对该病性质的诊断意见.

sentences.en: All this questioning is so analytical and clinical — it kills romance.
sentences.cn: 整个询问分析性和逻辑性太强，浪漫的气息荡然无存。

sentences.en: Ask your doctor for a referral to a clinical psychologist.
sentences.cn: 让你的医生给你推荐一位临床心理学家。

sentences.en: Clinical symptoms found in young pigs suffering from choline deficiency are unthriftiness.
sentences.cn: 已发现的缺乏胆碱的幼猪的临床症状是身体憔悴.

sentences.en: For the first few months after Daniel died, I was in a state of clinical depression.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔去世后的最初几个月里，我一直处于临床抑郁症的状态。

sentences.en: He practises as a clinical psychologist.
In the meantime, they're heading toward clinical trials within a few years.
sentences.cn: 同时, 他们打算在几年内就向临床实验进军.

sentences.en: Obstruction of the ileum by stone leads to distinct clinical pictures.
sentences.cn: 回肠胆结石梗阻可引起各种明显的临床征象.

sentences.en: Since then, Wellcome has been scaling up production to prepare for clinical trials.
sentences.cn: 从那以后，威康公司一直在增加产量，为临床试验作准备。

sentences.en: Tell me about your clinical trials. How did they go?
sentences.cn: 跟我说说你的临床试验。进展如何？

sentences.en: The drug has undergone extensive clinical trials (= tests to see if it is effective in treating people ) .
sentences.cn: 该药已经过大量的临床试验。

sentences.en: The drug must first be tested in clinical trials to see if it works on other cancers.
sentences.cn: 这种药物必须首先经过临床测试，看它是否适用于其他癌症。

sentences.en: The Rockville , Maryland based company has five unique drugs in clinical trials.
sentences.cn: 马里兰州洛克威尔公司有五种独一无二的生物技术药已达到,临床试验阶段.

sentences.en: The therapy has helped people with clinical depression (= a strong feeling of sadness, for which you need medical help ) .
sentences.cn: 该疗法对临床抑郁症病人有帮助。

sentences.en: These data show that most cancers are detected as a result of clinical follow - up .
sentences.cn: 这些数据表明多数癌症是由临床 随访 查出来的.

sentences.en: They are doing clinical trials on a new drug.
sentences.cn: 他们正在做一种新药物的临床试验.

sentences.en: They have been treated with this drug in clinical trials.
sentences.cn: 他们已在临床试验中接受过这种药物的治疗。

words.tran_cn: 临床地；门诊部地；不偏不倚；通过临床诊断

trans.tran_cn: 临床的，不带感情的，简陋的
trans.tran_en: relating to treating or testing people who are sick
